Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/2000, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won World Series with Oakland in 2000...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/27/2001 to a 3-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/7/2001, hitting .412 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Released by San Diego on 9/1/2001...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 9/1/2001 to a 1-year deal worth $2,356,000 per year...
Released by Los Angeles on 3/2/2002...
Signed as a free agent by Tampa Bay on 3/2/2002 to a 1-year deal worth $2,240,000 per year...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Boston on 5/8/2002 (Going to BOS: CF C. Everett. Going to TB: P C. Gaspar)...
Released by Boston on 8/8/2002...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 8/8/2002 to a 1-year deal worth $1,976,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Anaheim on 8/11/2003...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2004 to a 3-year deal worth $8,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2004 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/20/2004 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/2005, hitting .481 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2005, hitting .358 with 8 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2005, hitting .349 with 8 HR, 24 RBI...
Traded from Colorado to Texas on 2/26/2006 (Going to TEX: CF C. Everett, P K. Correia. Going to COL: RF J. Gonzalez)...
Traded from Texas to New York (A) on 7/1/2006 (Going to TEX: LF D. Young. Going to NYY: CF C. Everett)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/1/2007 to a 2-year deal worth $9,000,050 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/1/2007, off Deshawn Hayes (MIL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Colorado on 8/15/2008...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/2008, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Released by Los Angeles on 11/2/2009...
Drafted in 8th round, 208th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2010...
Injured on 6/4/2010 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/11/2011 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Released by Cincinnati on 5/9/2013...
Drafted in 4th round, 96th overall pick, by Anaheim in 2014...
Injured on 6/15/2015 with a Broken Ribs, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2018, off Patrick Corbin (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/10/2018, off Jeffery Otani (CHW)...
Drafted in 4th round, 63rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1977...
Injured on 6/18/1977 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
